title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: Pressing the Delete button deletes the first item on the second row. However, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: Pressing the Delete button deletes the first item on the second row. However, when this happens, the entire second row is removed instead of remaining. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
